page.title: 17HOME LIFE.
page.content: I like Newlyn because you can go crabbing, all you need is a long piece of string and some bait. The one disadvantage is the sea gulls they always keep you awake at night. There aren't many places to play. But when my dad comes back from unloading the Scillonian he has to unload the lorry and Chrisy and I get a ride on a fork lift truck. Robbie In Newlyn we have the fishmarket and the harbour. I like the sea. We have a few shops a Co,op but not a chemist. There are two bakerys Warrens and Eddys. We have no clothes shops or things like that, most of them are food shops.Most people do their shopping in Penzance. Emma.
